dataList.dlg: You’ll… get shoved in this bag too!
Alright, I’ll sear you down to your guts!
Kahahaha! I'll fry you... all the way to the heart!
It's my turn to torment you now... Need some shock in your system?!
One. Two. The weight of your Karma returns with each rumbling of the earth.
The wheel of samsara turns once. And you are forthwith no more. For that is existence. For that is I.
Hah, here's a present for you!
You... and everything that crushed me under their feet, built this wall between me and Cathy...
I'll shove you all in this bag... drag it to the deepest corners of inferno...
... and pummel it, until my strength fails...!
